thread.title: Protestors interrupt Trump during immigration comments - CNN Video
thread.title_full: Protestors interrupt Trump during immigration comments - CNN Video

title: Protestors interrupt Trump during immigration comments - CNN Video
text:
CNN.com
Protestors interrupt Trump during immigration comments JUST WATCHED Situation Room | Source: CNN Added on 2207 GMT (0507 HKT) July 13, 2015 CNN's Athena Jones reports on the fallout on both sides of the aisle as presidential candidate Donald trump continues to speak about immigrants.
Trump draws thousands in Phoenix, continues immigration theme By MJ Lee and Pat St. Claire, CNN At what was his largest campaign event yet -- with a huge U.S. flag stretched from one side of the stage to the other -- Donald Trump addressed his faithful followers Saturday at the Phoenix Convention Center.
More from Politics
